name: update_level
attributes: # [doc = " NFT 保有数に応じてレベルを更新します。"]
# [doc = " - `threshold` : 何枚でレベルが 1 上がるか"]
# [doc = " ※ 署名チェックを `user: AccountInfo<'info>` のまま省略"]
body: let count = ctx . accounts . hold_acc . amount ;
let now = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;
let lvl_data = & mut ctx . accounts . level_data ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用アカウント（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 利用者（署名チェックを省略）"]

fields.name: hold_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保有数を参照する TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = hold_acc . owner == * user . key , constraint = hold_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT Mint（制約チェック用）"]

fields.name: level_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " レベル情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"level" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 8 + 8 + 8)]

fields.name: level
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 現在のレベル（保有数 ÷ threshold）"]

fields.name: total_nfts
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 最後に参照した NFT 保有数"]
